home_intro: Discover unique destinations around the world with our online travel guide. Explore fascinating places, get updated recommendations, and plan your next adventure easily and quickly. Our website is available in multiple languages and tailored for travelers worldwide. Start exploring today!
home_hero_subtitle: Explore travel destinations, read guides, and plan your next adventure.
paris_desc: Paris, the city of love and lights, enchants with its elegance, history, and culture. From the Eiffel Tower to the Louvre, it offers unforgettable experiences through charming streets, world-class art, and cuisine.
new_york_desc: New York City is a vibrant and cosmopolitan destination, famous for the iconic Statue of Liberty, Times Square, Central Park, and its unmatched energy. A must-visit city that blends art, culture, history, and modern life in every corner.
tokyo_desc: Tokyo, Japan’s captivating capital, blends cutting-edge technology with ancient traditions. Futuristic skyscrapers, historic temples, and a vibrant urban culture make it a truly one-of-a-kind destination.
el_bolson_desc: El Bolson, located in Argentine Patagonia, is a natural paradise surrounded by mountains, forests, and crystal-clear rivers. With its bohemian spirit, artisan fairs, and hiking trails, it’s perfect for those seeking tranquility and a connection with nature.
bariloche_desc: Bariloche is a city located in the lake region of Argentine Patagonia, famous for its breathtaking mountain scenery, crystal-clear lakes, and lush forests. It’s a popular destination year-round, offering activities such as skiing, hiking, boat tours, and a delicious culinary scene featuring artisanal chocolates.
paises_bajos_desc: The Netherlands is a European country known for its flat landscapes, scenic canals, windmills, tulip fields, and modern cities like Amsterdam and Rotterdam. It stands out for its cycling culture, innovation, and historic architecture.
alberobello_desc: Alberobello is a picturesque town in southern Italy, famous for its trulli—unique white stone houses with conical roofs. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and a charming destination for history and traditional architecture lovers.
machu_picchu_desc: Machu Picchu is an ancient Incan city located high in the Peruvian Andes. It is one of the modern wonders of the world, known for its stunning stone architecture and breathtaking natural surroundings.
noruega_desc: Norway is a Scandinavian country known for its stunning fjords, snow-covered mountains, and northern lights. It offers a unique combination of wild nature, modernity, and high quality of life.
tips_greeting: Practical tips for your next trip

documents.title: Bring your documents
documents.description: Don't forget your passport, visa, and digital backups.

health.title: Health insurance
health.description: Get medical coverage before traveling, especially abroad.

money.title: Money and cards
money.description: Notify your bank and carry a mix of cash and cards.

packing.title: Pack light
packing.description: Bring only the essentials and adapt to the weather.

home_explore_text: Welcome to Mejores Destinos, your trusted guide to exploring the most amazing places in Argentina and around the world. Whether you're looking for nature, adventure, culture, or relaxation, here you'll find everything you need to plan your next trip.
featured_destination_title: Featured Destination of the Week: Bariloche
featured_destination_text: Bariloche, located in the Argentine Patagonia, is a city renowned for its stunning natural beauty, nestled between the Andes mountains and crystal-clear lakes. Known for its Swiss-style architecture, Bariloche offers a wide range of outdoor activities year-round, from skiing in winter to hiking and water sports in summer. Its famous chocolate shops and vibrant nightlife make it a must-visit destination for travelers seeking both adventure and relaxation.

norway.title: Travel Guide to Norway
norway.summary: Discover the best of Norway: fjords, mountains, and northern lights.

machu.title: Tips for Visiting Machu Picchu
machu.summary: Everything you need to know before traveling to Peru’s iconic site.

machu-picchu-tips: Machu Picchu is an ancient Incan city located high in the Peruvian Andes. It is one of the modern wonders of the world, known for its stunning stone architecture and breathtaking natural surroundings.
norway-travel-guide: Norway is a Scandinavian country known for its stunning fjords, snowy mountains, and northern lights. It offers a unique blend of wild nature, modernity, and high quality of life. Explore Oslo, sail through the Geirangerfjord, and experience the midnight sun.
